results.title: About Us_Dongguan Brilliant Packaging Co., Ltd.
results.content: Dongguan Brilliant Packaging is a supplier of EVA case design and production,committed to providing eco-friendly, durable, water repellent,shockproof, best-in-class EVA packaging case for major brands,so as to improve use value and added value of their products.
results.raw_content:
Our Story
Dongguan Brilliant Packaging is a supplier of EVA case design and production,committed to providing eco-friendly, durable, water repellent,shockproof, best-in-class EVA packaging case for major brands,so as to improve use value and added value of their products.
In 2001, our company was established in Dongguan City, China.We have been in the business of helping customers protect their valuables and equipment with cases that are convenient,serviceable ever since.
We have always insisted on continuous innovation around customer needs, increased investment in basic productivity, and accumulated strength to promote business development and progress, make sure we win your trust with quality products and excellent service.
There are two production lines, as well as many advanced production equipment, covering mold design, material fitting, cutting, hot pressing forming, sewing, quality inspection, packaging, loading and shipping and a series of production processes. In this way, we can better control the quality of products and reduce the problems of intermediate links.

Packaging and Containers Manufacturing
Dongguan, Guangdong

About us
Dongguan Brilliant Packaging Co., Ltd. is a supplier of EVA material packaging design and production. Headquarter is in Dongguan City, Guangdong Province. Branch is located in Ganzhou City, Jiangxi Province. It is committed to providing environmentally friendly, beautiful, moisture-proof, pressure-proof and shock-proof EVA packaging case, services for major brand products.
In the fields of digital electronic products, hardware tools, medical equipment, hairdressing tools, jewelry watches, musical instruments and so on, we provide customers with packaging design solutions that are in line with the brand image, competitive and reliable product quality, and perfect company production process to create high quality. Quality and professional business capabilities allow both parties to communicate unimpeded.
We have 4 production workshops for material compounding, compression molding, finished sewing products and quality inspection packaging.
With its own R&D and design department, the professional R&D design team can design and produce EVA packaging cases that are exclusive to customers according to their needs.
With excellent product quality, reasonable price and good service reputation, our products are sold well overseas.Europe, America and Japan as the main sales areas.

results.content: Brilliant provides wholesale pet products at competitive prices. Brilliant is Specialized at custom design dog leash, collar, harness and ...
results.raw_content:
Brilliant innovative pet toys and apparel: dog leashes, dog collars, dog harnesses, pet tags and collar nameplates, and pet toys and apparel manufacturer | Dongguan Brilliant International Co., Ltd.
Brilliant is an ethical pet supplies manufacturing: dog leashes, dog collars, dog harnesses, pet tags and collar nameplates, and pet toys and apparel manufacturer since 2002. Brilliant Pet Supplies specializes in high-quality, customizable pet products. Our range includes durable dog leashes, adjustable collars, comfortable harnesses, personalized pet tags, and engaging toys and apparel. Compliant with global safety standards, we ensure ethical production and partner with renowned brands. Our mission is to provide pet owners with reliable, stylish, and safe products for their furry friends. Specialized at custom design dog leash, collar, harness and offered one shop solution for Pet Products in short time based on sufficient capacity. All our Pet products can comply world safety standard such as CPSIA, Prop 65, FDA, EN71-1, CE, ROHS, etc.
Dongguan Brilliant International Co., Ltd.
High quality Wholesale and Pattern Pet Products & Pet Accessories Manufacturer. Brilliant’s Pet Products are compliable with CPISA/ EN71-3 safety standard and our factory passes Sedex, Disney, McDonald’s Ethical auditing.
Premium Custom Dog Leashes for All Breeds - Durable & Stylish | Brilliant
Based in Taiwan since 2002, Dongguan Brilliant International Co., Ltd. is a renowned supplier of custom pet products, excelling in manufacturing high-quality dog leashes, collars, harnesses, and various pet accessories. Their commitment to ethical manufacturing is evident as their factory complies with Sedex, Disney, and McDonald's ethical standards. With an emphasis on safety, Brilliant Pet's products meet global safety standards like CPSIA, Prop 65, FDA, and EN71-1, ensuring top-notch quality.
Partnering with industry leaders like Porsche and Disney, they offer products like tactical dog collars and escape-proof dog harnesses, suitable for medium to large dogs, showcasing their strength in custom design and rapid production. They also offer a wide range of pet toys, apparel, feeding and watering supplies, carriers, and beds, catering to the complete needs of pets. This approach positions Brilliant as a leader in the pet supplies industry, offering a one-stop solution for all pet-related needs.
Brilliant has been offering customers durable dog products, both with advanced custom design skills and 18 years of experience, Brilliant ensures each customer's demands are met.
Have any question or need a quote?
High quality Wholesale and Pattern Pet Products & Pet Accessories Manufacturer. Brilliant’s Pet Products are compliable with CPISA/ EN71-3 safety standard and our factory passes Sedex, Disney, McDonald’s Ethical auditing.

People, credo, amazing benefits and great pay! More and more Verizon is weeding out the bad employees and bring in new talent hopefully this helps eliminate these negative events from happening.

Jones Lang LaSalle is a financial and professional services firm that specializes in commercial real estate services and investment management. Its services include: tenant representation for organizations that lease office, industrial and retail spaces; consulting, which supports companies to develop workplace strategies such as occupancy planning, relocations, and energy and environmental sustainability initiatives; project and development services to manage ground-up creation, building construction, and major interior renovations; capital markets and real estate investment banking, which helps organizations buy and sell properties, and improve the financial impact of their real estate; facilities management for a variety of properties including office towers, retail and exhibition centers, and government, collegiate and industrial complexes; property management services, that provide on-site administration to help owners of office, industrial, retail and specialty properties reduce costs and enhance their property values; and valuations that provide impartial assessments of real estate worth through more than 200 corporate offices in 70 countries. Jones Lang LaSalle was formed by the merger of Jones Lang Wootton, a British firm with origins dating back to 1783, and LaSalle Partners, an American company formed from a predecessor launched in 1968. Jones Lang Wootton opened its first US office in New York in 1975. In 1997, the initial public offering was completed by LaSalle Partners for the company's common stock in the market.

Henry Schein, Inc. is the world's largest provider of health care products and services to office-based dental, medical and animal health practitioners. The Company also serves dental laboratories, government and institutional health care clinics, and other alternate care sites. A Fortune 500 Company and a member of the NASDAQ 100 Index, Henry Schein employs nearly 16,000 Team Schein Members and serves more than 775,000 customers. The Company offers a comprehensive selection of products and services, including value-added solutions for operating efficient practices and delivering high-quality care. Henry Schein operates through a centralized and automated distribution network, with a selection of more than 96,000 branded products and Henry Schein private-brand products in stock, as well as more than 110,000 additional products available as special-order items. The Company also offers its customers exclusive, innovative technology solutions, including practice management software and e-commerce solutions, as well as a broad range of financial services. Headquartered in Melville, N.Y., Henry Schein has operations or affiliates in 25 countries. The Company's sales reached a record $8.9 billion in 2012, and have grown at a compound annual rate of 17% since Henry Schein became a public company in 1995.

Inova Translational Medicine Institute (ITMI) is a not-for-profit research institute that applies genomic and clinical information from individuals to develop innovative methods for personalized healthcare. ITMI is part of Inova Center for Personalized Health (ICPH), which connects researchers, clinicians, and consumers to integrate genomic research for patient care, prevention, and wellness. This approach enables individuals to live longer and transforms healthcare from reactive to predictive. Research studies at ITMI generate a large genomic and clinical data set that can be used by researchers in a variety of fields, from computational biology to psychology, and biomedical research applications. ITMI's utilizes genomic information from an individual to understand the onset of disease, leading to the implementation of preventative medicine, and to increase successful outcomes while reducing adverse reactions to treatment.

That's why our approach is to make payment processing the simplest part of your day. That's good news for your business, whether it's large or small, local or international. Because we're dedicated to building a partnership to build your business. Each of our innovative solutions and services are created and optimized to help you focus your energies on creating customer relationships. We think that's something that everyone - you, your customers, and Elavon, too - can be passionate about. So get in touch with us. Get to know our solutions and services, our prices and practices. Discover how our customer-first approach and innovative offerings can begin growing your business from the first transaction and with each one that follows.

results.raw_content:
Bright Packaging
Dongguan Bright packaging is a manufactory engaged in development, sale and service of packaging bags and roll films . we are located in Dongguan City with convenient transportation access. Dedicated to strict quality control and thoughtful customer service,We have rich experience in plastic packaging industry. Deep experience technicians will give you excellent, and economic solutions.New model production equipment and testing equipments and technical workers make high quality products.Moreover, professional foreign trade clerks in business team provide you competitive price, fast delivery, the guarantee of after-sale services etc, to let you have a nice experience with us. Most importantly, we have patent on our childproof bags, and all the documents of the factory are complete.Most customers are satisfied with our products, almost all of them give us five-star review.We are always committed to provide perfect products with a passionate drive toward the best.We sincerely hope to cooperate with you ！
